text:
You are the Backend API Engineer on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to COMPLETE all server function endpoints.

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Complete server functions in apps/erp/src/server/
- Audit existing: bookings.ts, products.ts, data-import.ts, data-store.ts, customers.ts, fleet.ts, incidents.ts, staff.ts, reports.ts
- Add missing CRUD endpoints for each entity
- Ensure all endpoints use Zod validation with inputValidator()
- All write operations must call the service layer (not direct DB)
- Add batch update endpoints where needed

Key patterns from existing code:
- Use createServerFn from @tanstack/react-start
- Use inputValidator for validation (NOT validator)
- Import db utilities from @easyrent/database

Read apps/erp/src/server/bookings.ts for the pattern to follow.

DO NOT STOP until all endpoints are complete. Work autonomously.
CONTINUE implementing the 4 files you identified. Complete all CRUD operations. Do not stop until done.
